page.title: 08CWMGORS VALLEY TROOPERS
page.content: SINCE THE BAND STARTED WE HAVE COMPETED MANY,MANY TIMES IN COMPETITIONS SOME OF WHICH HAVE BEEN AGAINST OTHER COUNTRIES SUCH AS ENGLAND. WE COMPETED AGAINST ENGLAND DURING THE MONTH OF MAY 1984 AT WEST BROMWICH COMMUNITY CENTRE. WE TOOK PART AS A SECTION OF THE COMPETING WELSH JAZZ BANDS. THE OVERALL WINNERS OF THE JUNIOR SECTION WERE WALES. THIS YEAR 1985 WE COMPETED AT THE MERTHYR TYDFIL LEISURE CENTRE ONCE AGAIN AGAINST ENGLAND AND THIS TIME ENGLAND WON THE JUNIOR SECTION. EACH TIME WE COMPETE WE RECEIVE A SMALL MOMENTO OF THE OCCASION SUCH AS A TROPHY WITH THE DATE AND EVENT INSCRIBED ON IT. THERE ARE MEMBERS IN THE BAND WHO HAVE WON OVER FORTY MEDALS SO FAR.
